data.name: Football Manager 2019 Touch - No Loan Restrictions
data.detailed_description: This abolishes the rules regarding loan transfers so users can loan in or out as many players as they like.
data.about_the_game: This abolishes the rules regarding loan transfers so users can loan in or out as many players as they like.
data.short_description: This abolishes the rules regarding loan transfers so users can loan in or out as many players as they like.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1), 8/8.1, 10 (1803/April 2018 Update) – 64-bit or 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10.5, 10.11.6, 10.12.5, 10.13.5, 10.14 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
